choices: 20 something guy, live on your own, have a job, pay your rent
1.title: Character set up

choices: other time or even in the future
11.content:
Your name is Al, like Al Bundy, while Al is short or nick name for Albert. But what normal 20something guy living in the US would like the name Albert…
Anyhow your life is rather organized; you have a steady rather ok paid job at some IT company, which sells software for automotive industry. So therefore you moved to Detroit, while your parents live in some other far away region of the US.
You live alone and since you are rather new to your company and to Detroit you have not yet many friends around here. Your main target to get a woman is one of your problems, more or less the only real problem you have…
This morning, you are about to start your day, are on the way to the bathroom to have a shower, shave and so on…
Suddenly you black out and when you open your eyes again you are…..
11.title: 20 something guy, live on your own, have a job,...

choices: it looks different, where is my bed? Why are those moving boxes still around?
111.content:
Wondering why you suddenly blocked out, but since you moved into this apartment 13 month ago, on the first glance you notice nothing different. You only wonder why you are out of razors for your shave, since you are pretty sure, you bought a 10pieces package yesterday…
Ok. No shave today, so you leave the bathroom and step back to your bedroom…
111.title: 1 year in the past

choices: the new general manager is a woman
the new general manager is a man
1112.content:
You wonder where those moving boxes in your bedroom suddenly come from? Huh you moved in here over one year ago and now it looks like you were just recently moved to this place? What happened, you have no clue and only wonder.
Anyhow you have no real time to wonder and search for reasons, because today is your first day to meet the new general manager…
1112.title: it looks different, where is my bed? Why are th...

11123.content:
Albert decided to jump back ten years to when he was ten years old.

When he did he lost his balance and fell onto the road and felt immense pain so he quickly dialled back to his own time.

What he didn't know was he lost his genitalia and the surgeon had to do emergency surgery and preformed a sex change operation on him when he was ten years old.

He had to go through puberty as his body developed feminine features due to his body now having more estrogen then testosterone now.

Albert returned to his own apartment and felt better been back but his body felt off...
11123.title: another time jump

choices: The size of a dust speck on a woman's geta sandal in ancient Japan
The size of an ant on a table full of food in ancient Rome
You time jump again before you find out
1113.content: You blackout again and when you wake up you notice you are on a wooden surface. When you stand up you take a look at your surroundings and you notice weird massive structures. You finally figure out where and when you are. You had shrunk and are now....
1113.title: Smaller in the ancient past.

choices: The boy tells you to follow him.
115.content:
Suddenly you realize that you have been transported back to Ancient Rome and you have actually ended up in one of the bathhouses , as you look around you see the emperor himself surrounded by body guards and you quickly reconize that he is the Emperor Caligula ...
You have read about this Emperor and quickly make for the nearest place to slip away... as you are rounding the corner of the bathhouse you run right into a small boy who is tending to the patrons of the bathhouse and then ...
115.title: other time or even in the future

choices: back in time before the accident happend
some other time or even future
12.content:
Your name is George and you recently turned 18!
You are in local high school and also in the sports team. You are happy that you have been promoted to team captain; even this has some bad background. Your friend and team mate, Tom had a freaky accident, where he lost his legs. No after almost 1 year he is slowly recovering from a medical perspective, but not from mental. He is no longer the smart sunny boy he had been. You understand this, but as a friend you do everything to support him.
You are also trying to convince Becky not to break with him, but she can’t stand it, seeing hi suffering so much and she is a young attractive girl having a boyfriend in a wheelchair… no she can’t take this any longer and is about to break with him tonight.
You know this from her friend, who is very close to you and think about how you can stop Becky from her plan.
You are about to leave your room to go over to Tom as you black out.
When you open your eyes again you are…
12.title: Male, high school, 17 to 18

121.content:
You are at the football field and wonder how you came here?
Anyhow what you makes you even more wonder is that you see….
121.title: back in time before the accident happend

choices: Forward in time to the point he left off
1211.content:
Tom realised he had his legs back and then looked at the date and noticed tomorrow he'll have his accident.

He going to make sure it doesn't happen again so he carried on like nothing has happened and the following day he still has an accident but he doesn't loose his legs.

Laid in the hospital bed happy about seeing his legs....

What he didn't know was he lost his genitalia and the surgeon had to do emergency surgery and preformed a sex change operation on him....
1211.title: Tom running around

choices: Back in time to try and fix it
12112.content:
You wake up in your bedroom and then message Tom as you don't know about the emergency surgery he had.

You got out of bed and walked to Tom's house to see if he's OK especially since he has his legs back.

You knocked on his door and him mother answered and invited you inside and told you Tom is upstairs, so you are welcome to wake him up.

You go to Tom's room and wake in and wake him up...

Tom sat up and said "hi George" his voice sounded different almost softer as did his skin and face, he still had short hair but something was off about him.

He then got out of bed and you noticed he's wearing a pair of black girls boyshorts and you immediately realised he's missing something between his legs as they are tight against it.

You look further and noticed he has very small breast developing on his chest.

You carry on as you normally do and Tom says "I hate that I lost my genitalia and I was replaced by virgina" but I think God you are still my friend George especially after the surgery a year ago....
12112.title: Forward in time to the point he left off

14.content:
My name is James, I am 13 years old, and tomorrow I will turn 14.
My Dad works as a scientist for a secret government project, even my mom does not know what exactly he is doing. He only works hard and even on the weekends he is not at home most of the times…
I was so much disappointed that he was not around for our family Christmas Party recently and he promised it will become different next year and he also promised to be around on my birthday and spend the complete day with me…..
So this will be tomorrow and I hope he will keep his promise. It was 10 o’clock and he was not even home yet. I went to bed and felt asleep…
14.title: Grade school, boy, 13

info.brief_description: What would you do if you started jumping through time?
info.description:
You are a normal person, nothing too special, but nothing realy bad either. Without warning you start to jump through time. Not literaly jumping. Its passive, like you know its about to happen then blink you're there.

This is not Quantum Leap. You do not possess someone from the past. You literaly go back, sometimes into your own past, sometimes way farther. You can go to the future but not too far because it hasn't been writen yet...weard science stuff there.

Rules:
Have fun
No junk chapters,
No one Liners.

I will allow just about anything. Remember this is a personal fantacy so what would you do if you could go back and maybe have a chance with that 8th grade teacher you realy had a crush on, or go and meat Ceaser, or take a shot at Hitler. I don't mind graphic as long as you use your brain and make it tasteful.

Enjoy.
